description: Students explore the form, history and theory of a particular genre or medium, including film, the novella, drama, poetry and short story, or the works of a single author or period. Coursework includes close reading, discussion, analysis and interpretation of texts. Taught in German. Prerequisite: minimum of one 270-level course. May be repeated if topic is different.
name: Top: Novella
prerequisites: Prerequisite: minimum of one 270-level course. May be repeated if topic is different.
title: Topics in Literature
